metadata.synopsis: this goblin has just killed a group of tiefling children - he feels pretty bad about it and he really isn't used to feeling bad about killing ANYTHING

0.speaker: Warrior Kramp
0.text: Must be getting soft - almost felt bad for 'em.
0.context: NodeContext: he's just killed a bunch of tiefling children and is feeling kind of bad about it. Which is an unusual sensation for him.
